mean_en: a range of many people or things that are very different from each other; the quality or fact of including a range of many people or things
sentence: We can see a great ethnic diversity from these kids.
sentence_trans: 从这些孩子身上，我们可以看到种族多样性。
word_etyma: di分开 ＋ vers转变 ＋ ity表名词 → 分开转变 → diversity多样性
